ComicInfo.Title: Fighter Beat; The Zitinator 3000; The Amazingly Clairvoyant Ricig's Predictions for 1995; Nobody Said Life Was Fair; Awkward Moments for Limbs to Fall Off; Frozen; If TV Is So Influential How Come...; Crackedheads; Cracked Signs; When the Power Rangers' Format Spreads to Other TV Shows; Jean Claude Van Damme: Serious Actor?; Hollywood Sports Fantasy vs. Everyday Reality; O. J. Industries; New NFL Rules; Top 11 Cracked Magazine New Year's Resolutions for 1995; Meat-Fighter
